entry.title: Kamix, version 1.0.0 (early access)
entry.summary: Kamix, version 1.0.0 is officially out! However, it's an early-access build, so not everything is here and bugs may occur. Since there are no changes…
entry.content:
Kamix, version 1.0.0 is officially out! However, it's an early-access build, so not everything is here and bugs may occur.

Since there are no changes to log (this is Kamix's first post, after all), the usual "Added", "Removed", and "Changed" headers are not there.

If you want to download Kamix's source code (.pmp) or try Kamix the intended way (https://use.kamix.sdisk.us), click on their respective links.
